import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import UserService from "../services/user.service"; const ChangePassword = () => { const [content, setContent] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [reload, setReload] = useState(false); return (
Password
{loading && ( )}
Name {content.prename + " " + content.name}
Email {content.email}
Phone {content.phone}
) } export default ChangePassword
